casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Kenneth Joel CUPID. No. 560P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 6, 2005. M. Alexander Charns, Durham, for Kenneth Joel Cupid. R. Stuart Albright, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 6th day of October 2005 by the Attorney General for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 6th day of October 2005."
